subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Nextel Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch will leave Hendrick Motorsports after this season and is one of three Hendrick drivers in the Chase for the Nextel Cup.
snippet: Kyle Busch will leave Hendrick Motorsports after this season and is one of three Hendrick drivers in the Chase for the Nextel Cup.
